context: Freshworks provides cloud-based customer engagement software including Freshdesk (support), Freshsales (CRM), and Freshservice (ITSM). The company targets SMBs and mid-market with affordable, easy-to-use solutions.

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in customer support and service desk software

competitors.name: Salesforce Service Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise customer service platform with broader CRM ecosystem

competitors.name: ServiceNow
competitors.notes: Enterprise IT service management competing with Freshservice

competitors.name: HubSpot
competitors.notes: CRM and marketing platform competing across multiple product lines

competitors.name: Zoho
competitors.notes: Business software suite with similar SMB focus and pricing

competitors.name: Intercom
competitors.notes: Customer messaging platform competing in support and engagement

competitors.name: Jira Service Management
competitors.notes: Atlassian's ITSM solution competing with Freshservice

competitors.name: Monday.com
competitors.notes: Work management platform with CRM and service capabilities
